Once upon a time, in a sky painted with blue and gold, there lived a fluffy little cloud named Nimbus. Unlike other clouds that soared high, Nimbus was terrified of heights. Every day, he watched his friends drift above, casting shadows on the earth below, while he hovered timidly at a low altitude.

One day, a storm approached, and the other clouds rallied to help. Nimbus wanted to assist but feared the climb. Gathering courage, he took a deep breath and rose slowly. To his surprise, he discovered a breathtaking view and the joy of helping others. Nimbus learned that sometimes, facing fears can lead to the most beautiful adventures.
